Game.Name: War in the Gulf (Brazil) (CCE, Gluk Video) (Unl)
Game.plot: The Persian Gulf and the Paradise of the Black Gold (Petroleum). Many countries depend on the oil for its proper economic development. One ambitious politician, to satisfy its desire to control the world, ogranized an army with extraordinary power fight and occupy the Persian Golf. The dependent countries had been without conditions to face this ruler, then, they had created an organization for the protection of peace worldwide and had sent the helicopter SUPER AH-64 to intervene in the enemy battlefield.
Game.Notes: The Persian Gulf is the Paradise of the Black Gold (Petroleum). Many countries depend on the oil for its proper economic development. One ambitious politician, to satisfy his desire to control the world, organized an army with extraordinary fight power and occupy the Persian Gulf. The dependent countries stayed without conditions to face this dominator, then, they created an organization for protection of worldwide peace and sent a SUPER AH-64 helicopter to intervene in the enemy battlefield.
